summary: Add all in all 8 rings to the game, each ring comes in two different color versions (silver/sapphire; gold/ruby). Plus left-hand versions.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][center][color=#ff7700][u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15578]Skyrim SSE Version this way﻿[/url]﻿[/u][/color][/center]
[color=#ff7700]Description:[/color][/b][/size]

This mod adds some rings for females to Skyrim, nothing fancy just seven different ring models in two colors (silver/sapphire; gold/ruby). The only variation in their unique design is that they show up on the ring finger of the right hand instead of the pointing finger. Because it is called 'ring finger' for a reason!
The reason they are only for females is their feminine 'nature', if there is interest I can add male versions too, or I use the time to create more jewelry ;-)

All of them are available for left and right hand since Version 1.1, also for male characters. If you aren't sure if you craft the left or right-hand version just take a look at the menu model, if the front is on the bottom its left and if it's up it the right-hand item.
I decide to use the same slot as in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58491]Left Hand Rings Modified[/url]
[center][img]https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-w3ppH3jw9pk/Wp7exrjpogI/AAAAAAAAB1k/VqARfgg-Evob-jUumgA1kNl8ixMKI2qSQCEwYBhgL/s1600/Left_Right%2BHand1.png[/img]﻿[/center]


[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]How to get them in-game:[/size][/color][/b]
Just craft them at a forge. Everything you need is to have an ingot of gold or silver in your inventory. (if you only have a silver ingot, for instance, you only see the silver rings in the smithing menu)

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size][/color]
Just drag and drop the .bsa and .esp files in your data folder and activate the mod (or use one of that mod organizer tools)

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]History:[/b][/size][/color]
1.1, 03/06/2018 - new ring, left hand, and male versions
1.0, 03/02/2018 - Initial release.

[color=#ff7700][size=3][b]Credits:[/b][/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to the entire modding community for being awesome.

[center][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/5/4632/38752623990_c80873d43d_o.png[/img]﻿[/center]
author: Avebrave

files.name: Ave's SkyRing
files.changelogHtml: 1.1, 03/06/2018 - new ring, left hand and male versions
